title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 212.36 - Infants' and incapacitated persons' claims and proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 212.36 - Infants' and incapacitated persons' claims and proceedings

State Regulations

The settlement of an action by an infant or
judicially declared incapacitated person (including an incompetent or
conservatee) shall comply with CPLR 1207 and 1208, section
202.67
of the Rules of the Chief

Administrator (22 NYCRR
202.67
) and in the case of an infant, with section
474
of the

Judiciary Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
212.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
